Uses of Class
java.lang.foreign.ValueLayout.OfDouble

Packages that use ValueLayout.OfDoublePREVIEW
Package
Description
java.lang.foreign
Provides low-level access to memory and functions outside the Java runtime.

  • Uses of ValueLayout.OfDoublePREVIEW in java.lang.foreign

    Fields in java.lang.foreign declared as ValueLayout.OfDoublePREVIEW
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final ValueLayout.OfDoublePREVIEW
    ValueLayout.JAVA_DOUBLE
    A value layout constant whose size is the same as that of a Java double, bit alignment set to 64, and byte order set to ByteOrder.nativeOrder().
